78011.example_1: mayā'pi kho etaṃ, brāhmaṇa, sutaṃ aggissa ādānaṃ yūpassa ussāpanaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mah'ānisaṃsan'ti. ta'y'idaṃ, bho gotama, sameti bhoto c'eva gotamassa amhākañ'ca, yadidaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ.
78011.example_2: na c'eso bhikkhu dhammavādī, na c'eso bhikkhu vinayavādī, m'āyasmantānam'pi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, samet'āyasmantānaṃ saṅghena, samaggo hi saṅgho sammodamāno avivadamāno ek'uddeso phāsu viharatī'ti.
78011.comment: this example is different from sameti 2.4 since here the subject is "it" and it additionally takes +dat - may it agree for Venerables with the Sangha

29561.grammar: ind, adv, abl sg of ta
29561.example_1: manopubbaṅ'gamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayā, manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā, tato naṃ dukkham'anveti, cakkaṃva vahato padaṃ.
29561.comment: as discussed , MN62 already in tato 1

50643.meaning_1: school of fish; shoal of fish
50643.example_1: najjāyo supatitthāyo, soṇṇavālukasanthatā, acchā savanti ambūni, macchagumbanisevitā.
50643.example_2: tattha cakkhumā puriso tīre ṭhito passeyya sippisambukam'pi sakkharakathalam'pi macchagumbam'pi, carantam'pi tiṭṭhantam'pi.

29236.example_1: āraddhavīriyo viharati, kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu, sarīre upasussatu maṃsalohitaṃ, yaṃ taṃ purisathāmena purisavīriyena purisaparakkamena pattabbaṃ, na taṃ apāpuṇitvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatī'ti.
29236.example_2: yo uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ, visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃ'va osadhehi, so bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇam'iva tacaṃ purāṇaṃ.

39080.meaning_1: able to leave; able to depart
39080.example_1: tamhā āvāsā pakkamantena ye tattha honti bhikkhū patirūpā, tesaṃ hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkamitabbaṃ. no ce honti bhikkhū patirūpā, ye tattha honti gahapatikā patirūpā, tesaṃ hatthe nikkhipitvā pakkamitabbaṃ.
39080.comment: actually VIN2.5.2.9 example need to be in pakkamitabba 2, please see context, I am moving it

39081.example_1: tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vā tamhā vanapatthā pakkamitabbaṃ, na vatthabbaṃ.
39081.example_2: maggena chādentassa dve magge adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṃ maggaṃ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṃ. pariyāyena chādentassa dve pariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatiyaṃ pariyāyaṃ āṇāpetvā pakkamitabbaṃ.

49906.meaning_1: community of nuns; female monastic order
49906.example_1: adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ vaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunīsaṅghaṃ vematiko ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa. adhammakamme adhammakammasaññī vaggaṃ bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ samaggasaññī ovadati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

49897.meaning_1: community of nuns; female monastic order
49897.example_1: upāsakā bhikkhunisaṅghassa cīvar'atthāya chandakaṃ saṃharitvā, aññatarassa pāvārikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ

12710.meaning_1: preparation of the windows; decoration of the windows
12710.example_1: mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya ālokasandhiparikammāya dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ

44923.meaning_1: (vinaya) to be invited; to be requested; should ask for criticism (wrt)
44923.meaning_2: (vinaya) to be invited; to be requested
44923.example_1: vassaṃ vuṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi pavāretabbaṃ diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, ayam'pi dhammo

26015.meaning_1: four month invitation for requisites; offer of support lasting four months
26015.example_1: agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya, aññatra niccapavāraṇāya. tato ce uttari sādiyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
26015.commentary: (KVa) catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā'ti cattāro māse gilānappaccayapavāraṇā, sabbañcetaṃ vatthuvasena vuttaṃ. ayaṃ pan'ettha attho, catumāsapavāraṇā vā hotu, punapavāraṇā vā, niccapavāraṇā vā, sabbā'pi sāditabbā, idāni mama rogo n'atthī'ti na paṭikkhipitabbā, roge pana sati viññāpessāmī'ti adhivāsetabbāti. tato ce uttari sādiyeyyā'ti ettha sace tattha rattīhi vā bhesajjehi vā paricchedo kato hoti ettakāyeva rattiyo, ettakāni vā bhesajjāni viññāpetabbānī'ti, atha tato rattipariyantato vā bhesajjapariyantato vā uttari, na bhesajjakaraṇīyena vā bhesajjaṃ, aññabhesajjakaraṇīyena vā aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ viññāpentassa pācittiyaṃ.

43754.meaning_1: who has become a homeless female spiritual seeker; engaged in homeless wandering
43754.example_1: paribbājikā nāma bhikkhuniñ'ca sikkhamānañ'ca sāmaṇeriñ'ca ṭhapetvā yā kāci paribbājikasamāpannā.

30624.meaning_1: perceiving (someone) as a disciple of another religion
30624.example_1: atitthiye titthiyasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. atitthiye vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. atitthiye atitthiyasaññī, anāpatti.

2144.meaning_1: perceiving as not a monastic of another sect; regarding (somebody) as not a teacher of another religion
2144.example_1: atitthiye titthiyasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. atitthiye vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. atitthiye atitthiyasaññī, anāpatti.
2144.commentary: (VINa) titthiye atitthiyasaññī'ti mātā vā pitā vā titthiyesu pabbajati, tesaṃ mātāpitusaññāya dentassā'pi pācittiyam'eva hoti.

2143.meaning_1: not a monastic of another sect; not a teacher of another religion
2143.construction:
na > a + √tir + tha + iya
atittha + iya
2143.example_1: atitthiye titthiyasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. atitthiye vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. atitthiye atitthiyasaññī, anāpatti.

15753.meaning_1: having placed close (to); having deposited near
15753.example_1: anāpatti dāpeti na deti, upanikkhipitvā deti, bāhir'ālepaṃ deti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

48376.example_1: anāpatti dāpeti na deti, upanikkhipitvā deti, bāhir'ālepaṃ deti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

20628.example_1: anupasampannaṃ uyyojeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. kalisāsanaṃ āropeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anupasampanne upasampannasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
20628.commentary: (VINa) kalisāsanaṃ āropetī'ti kalī'ti kodho, tassa sāsanaṃ āropeti, kodhassa āṇaṃ āropeti, kodhavasena ṭhānanisajj'ādīsu dosaṃ dassetvā passatha bho imassa ṭhānaṃ, nisajjaṃ ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ khāṇuko viya tiṭṭhati, sunakho viya nisīdati, makkaṭo viya ito c'ito ca viloketī'ti evaṃ amanāpavacanaṃ vadati app'eva nāma iminā'pi ubbāḷho pakkameyyā'ti.

19140.example_1: gilānassa vā ohiyyakassa vā vihārapālassa vā yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā nīharāti uyyojeti, na anācāraṃ ācaritu'kāmo, sati karaṇīye uyyojeti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

69698.meaning_1: guardian of the monastery; protector of the dwelling
69698.example_1: gilānassa vā ohiyyakassa vā vihārapālassa vā yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā nīharāti uyyojeti, na anācāraṃ ācaritu'kāmo, sati karaṇīye uyyojeti, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
69698.commentary: (SNa) vihārapālo'ti so kira tadā avassiko hoti pattacīvaraggahaṇe akovido. atha naṃ therā bhikkhū, āvuso, imāni chatt'upāhana-kattarayaṭṭhi-ādīni olokento nisīdā'ti vihārarakkhakaṃ katvā piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ, vihārapālo'ti.

46038.meaning_1: door post; top of the door frame
46038.example_1: nisajjaṃ kappeyyā'ti mahallake ghare piṭṭhisaṅghāṭassa hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa. khuddake ghare piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

60955.example_1: nasayanighare sayanigharasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nasayanighare vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nasayanighare nasayanigharasaññī, anāpatti.

35872.example_1: nasayanighare sayanigharasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nasayanighare vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nasayanighare nasayanigharasaññī, anāpatti.

35871.meaning_1: not a bedroom; not a sleeping chamber
35871.example_1: nasayanighare sayanigharasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nasayanighare vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. nasayanighare nasayanigharasaññī, anāpatti.

3532.meaning_1: having not gone beyond; having not crossed over
3532.construction:
na > an + ati + √kam + itvā
na + atikkamitvā
3532.example_1: anāpatti mahallake ghare piṭṭhasaṅghāṭassa hatthapāsaṃ avijahitvā nisīdati, khuddake ghare piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ anatikkamitvā nisīdati, bhikkhu dutiyo hoti, ubho nikkhantā honti, ubho vītarāgā, nasayanighare, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

41593.example_1: vajjanīyā ca puggalā tasmiṃ na honti kiṃ? gahaṭṭhapaṇḍaka'ādayo ekavīsati vajjanīyā puggalā hatthapāsato bahikaraṇavasena vajjetabbā. te asmiṃ na honti.
41593.example_2: yakkhiyā vā petiyā vā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānagatāya vā manussaviggah'itthiyā vā saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. amātugāme mātugāmasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
41593.commentary: (VINa) paṇḍako bhikkhave'ti ettha āsittapaṇḍako usūyapaṇḍako opakkamikapaṇḍako pakkhapaṇḍako napuṃsakapaṇḍako'ti pañca paṇḍakā. tattha yassa paresaṃ aṅgajātaṃ mukhena gahetvā asucinā āsittassa pariḷāho vūpasammati, ayaṃ āsittapaṇḍako. yassa paresaṃ ajjhācāraṃ passato usūyāya uppannāya pariḷāho vūpasammati, ayaṃ usūyapaṇḍako. yassa upakkamena bījāni apanītāni, ayaṃ opakkamikapaṇḍako. ekacco pana akusalavipāk'ānubhāvena kāḷapakkhe paṇḍako hoti, juṇhapakkhe pan'assa pariḷāho vūpasammati, ayaṃ pakkhapaṇḍako. yo pana paṭisandhiyaṃ'y'eva abhāvako uppanno, ayaṃ napuṃsakapaṇḍako'ti. tesu āsittapaṇḍakassa ca usūyapaṇḍakassa ca pabbajjā na vāritā, itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vāritā. tesu'pi pakkhapaṇḍakassa yasmiṃ pakkhe paṇḍako hoti, tasmiṃ'y'evassa pakkhe pabbajjā vāritā'ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ. yassa c'ettha pabbajjā vāritā, taṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo upasampanno nāsetabbo'ti. so'pi liṅganāsanen'eva nāsetabbo. ito paraṃ nāsetabbo'ti vuttesu'pi es'eva nayo.

51229.meaning_1: which has taken the form of a human female
51229.example_1: yakkhiyā vā petiyā vā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānagatāya vā manussaviggah'itthiyā vā saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa. amātugāme mātugāmasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

37746.example_1: animantite nimantitasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. animantite vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. animantite animantitasaññī, anāpatti.

4224.example_1: animantite nimantitasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. animantite vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. animantite animantitasaññī, anāpatti.

5741.meaning_1: in-between monasteries; (comm) monastery inside the village
5741.example_1: anāpatti samaye, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchā pavisati, asantaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā pavisati, aññassa gharena maggo hoti, gharūpacārena maggo hoti, antarārāmaṃ gacchati, bhikkhun'upassayaṃ gacchati

30629.example_1: antarārāmaṃ gacchati, bhikkhun'upassayaṃ gacchati, titthiyaseyyaṃ gacchati, paṭikkamanaṃ gacchati, bhattiyagharaṃ gacchati, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

49326.meaning_1: house which has provided a meal invitation; (or) devotees' house
49326.example_1: antarārāmaṃ gacchati, bhikkhun'upassayaṃ gacchati, titthiyaseyyaṃ gacchati, paṭikkamanaṃ gacchati, bhattiyagharaṃ gacchati, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

49324.example_1: antarārāmaṃ gacchati, bhikkhun'upassayaṃ gacchati, titthiyaseyyaṃ gacchati, paṭikkamanaṃ gacchati, bhattiyagharaṃ gacchati, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

29547.example_1: natat'uttari tat'uttarisaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. natat'uttari vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. natat'uttari natat'uttarisaññī, anāpatti.
29547.commentary: (VVt) tato catumāsato uttari atirekaṃ tatuttari, tatuttari na hotī'ti natatuttari, natatuttarī'ti saññā assa atthī'ti natatuttarisaññī

35513.meaning_1: perceiving (something) as not more than that
35513.example_1: natat'uttari tat'uttarisaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. natat'uttari vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. natat'uttari natat'uttarisaññī, anāpatti.
35513.commentary: (VVt) tato catumāsato uttari atirekaṃ tatuttari, tatuttari na hotī'ti natatuttari, natatuttarī'ti saññā assa atthī'ti natatuttarisaññī

35512.example_1: natat'uttari tat'uttarisaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. natat'uttari vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. natat'uttari natat'uttarisaññī, anāpatti.
35512.commentary: (VVt) tato catumāsato uttari atirekaṃ tatuttari, tatuttari na hotī'ti natatuttari, natatuttarī'ti saññā assa atthī'ti natatuttarisaññī

11343.meaning_1: having told; having related; having described
11343.example_1: nārado sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā iminā kāraṇena ahaṃ iminā abhisapito, ath'āhaṃ, mayhaṃ doso n'atthi, yassa doso atthi, tass'eva upari abhisapo patatū'ti vatvā abhisapiṃ
11343.example_2: amhākañ'ca iminā ca iminā ca bhesajjena attho'ti ācikkhitvā viññāpeti, yāsu tayā rattīsu pavāritāmha tāyo ca rattiyo vītivattā amhākañ'ca bhesajjena attho'ti ācikkhitvā viññāpeti

40544.example_1: dvīhatīhapayāto kho pana so sattho addasa purisaṃ kāḷaṃ lohit'akkhaṃ sannaddhakalāpaṃ kumudamāliṃ allavatthaṃ allakesaṃ kaddamamakkhitehi cakkehi bhadrena rathena paṭipathaṃ āgacchantaṃ, disvā etadavoca, kuto, bho, āgacchasī'ti? amukamhā janapadā'ti.
40544.example_2: anāpatti ārāme ṭhito passati, bhikkhussa ṭhit'okāsaṃ vā nisinn'okāsaṃ vā nipann'okāsaṃ vā āgacchati, paṭipathaṃ gacchanto passati, tathārūpappaccayā, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

16962.example_1: anuyyutte uyyuttasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anuyyutte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anuyyutte anuyyuttasaññī, anāpatti.

5111.example_1: anuyyutte uyyuttasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anuyyutte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anuyyutte anuyyuttasaññī, anāpatti.

5110.meaning_1: (of an army) not deployed; not on active duty; not on the march; (comm) not camped or on the march
5110.example_1: anuyyutte uyyuttasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anuyyutte vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. anuyyutte anuyyuttasaññī, anāpatti.
5110.commentary: (VINa) anuyyuttā nāma rājā uyyānaṃ vā nadiṃ vā gacchati, evaṃ anuyyuttā hoti. (VVt) anuyyutte'pī'ti saṅgāmaṃ vinā aññena kāraṇena nikkhante. yath'āha anuyyuttā nāma rājā uyyānaṃ vā nadiṃ vā gacchati, evaṃ anuyyuttā hotī'ti.

2295.example_1: atirekatiratte vematiko senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa. atirekatiratte ūnakasaññī senāya vasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.

55118.example_1: gilāno vasati, gilānassa karaṇīyena vasati, senā vā paṭisenāya ruddhā hoti, kenaci palibuddho hoti, āpadāsu, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

50704.example_1: amajje majjasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. amajje vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. amajje amajjasaññī, anāpatti.

8446.example_1: amajje majjasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. amajje vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. amajje amajjasaññī, anāpatti.

8444.meaning_1: not intoxicant; not drug; not alcohol
8444.example_1: amajje majjasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. amajje vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. amajje amajjasaññī, anāpatti.

50706.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
50706.commentary: (VINa) amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasan'ti loṇasovīrakaṃ vā suttaṃ vā hoti.

50690.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
50690.commentary: (VINa) amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasan'ti loṇasovīrakaṃ vā suttaṃ vā hoti.

50703.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
50703.commentary: (VINa) amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasan'ti loṇasovīrakaṃ vā suttaṃ vā hoti.

64737.meaning_1: meal cooked with bean curry; cooked dish with dahl
64737.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
64737.commentary: (VINa) sūpasampāke'ti vāsagāhāpan'atthaṃ īsakaṃ majjaṃ pakkhipitvā sūpaṃ pacanti, tasmiṃ anāpatti. maṃsasampāke'pi es'eva nayo.

52118.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
52118.commentary: (VINa) sūpasampāke'ti vāsagāhāpan'atthaṃ īsakaṃ majjaṃ pakkhipitvā sūpaṃ pacanti, tasmiṃ anāpatti. maṃsasampāke'pi es'eva nayo.

31301.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
31301.commentary: (VINa) telaṃ pana vātabhesajj'atthaṃ majjena saddhiṃ pacanti, tasmim'pi anatikkhittamajje'y'eva anāpatti, yaṃ pana atikkhittamajjaṃ hoti, ettha majjassa vaṇṇagandharasā paññāyanti, tasmiṃ āpatti'y'eva.

60432.phonetic:
ṃp > mp
a > ā
c > k (Kacc 623, 554)
60432.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.
60432.commentary: (VINa) sūpasampāke'ti vāsagāhāpan'atthaṃ īsakaṃ majjaṃ pakkhipitvā sūpaṃ pacanti, tasmiṃ anāpatti. maṃsasampāke'pi es'eva nayo.

12091.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

12088.meaning_1: fruit of emblic myrobalan; amla; nellie; Phyllanthus Emblica
12088.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

8958.example_1: anāpatti amajjañ'ca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

26522.example_1: bhājanagataṃ udakaṃ vā kañjikaṃ vā khīraṃ vā takkaṃ vā rajanaṃ vā passāvaṃ vā cikkhallaṃ vā kīḷati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

10862.example_1: udake ahasadhamme hasadhammasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. udake ahasadhamme vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. udake ahasadhamme ahasadhammasaññī, anāpatti.

71089.example_1: udake ahasadhamme hasadhammasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. udake ahasadhamme vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. udake ahasadhamme ahasadhammasaññī, anāpatti.

10863.example_1: udake ahasadhamme hasadhammasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa. udake ahasadhamme vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa. udake ahasadhamme ahasadhammasaññī, anāpatti.

35194.meaning_lit: for the sake of shaking off
35194.example_1: apaññattena vuccamāno, idaṃ na sallekhāya na dhut'atthāya na pāsādikatāya na apacayāya na vīriy'ārambhāya saṃvattatī'ti anādariyaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

61221.example_1: nivatth'avatthen'eva gehato nikkhamitvā paramasallekhavuttiko'pi abalabalo amandamando viya paresaṃ acittakarūpena hīḷitaparibhūto hutvā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu ekarattivāsen'eva vicarati.
61221.example_2: apaññattena vuccamāno, idaṃ na sallekhāya na dhutatthāya na pāsādikatāya na apacayāya na vīriy'ārambhāya saṃvattatī'ti anādariyaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
61221.commentary: (MNa) sallekho'ti ca idha avihiṃsā'va veditabbā. avihiṃsā hi vihiṃsaṃ sallekhati, taṃ chindati, tasmā sallekho'ti vuccati. esa nayo sabbattha. ayaṃ pana viseso.

45912.meaning_1: fact of being pleasing; fact of inspiring confidence
45912.construction:
pa + sāde + a + ika + tā
pāsādika + tā
45912.example_1: apaññattena vuccamāno, idaṃ na sallekhāya na dhutatthāya na pāsādikatāya na apacayāya na vīriy'ārambhāya saṃvattatī'ti anādariyaṃ karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

14183.example_1: anāpatti, evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho paripucchā'ti bhaṇati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassā'ti.

17461.grammar: ind, adv, abl sg of eka
17461.example_2: ayaṃ pan'ettha saṅkhepo, bhagavato kira bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pañcannaṃ mahānadīnaṃ mah'oghasadise lābhasakkāre uppanne hatalābhasakkārā aññatitthiyā sūriy'uggamanakāle khajjopanakā viya nippabhā hutvā ekato sannipatitvā mantayiṃsu.
17461.comment: I think lit can be traced to suffix "to 2"

42909.example_1: atta'd'atthaṃ par'atthena, bahunā'pi na hāpaye, atta'd'attham'abhiññāya, sadatthapasuto siyā.
42909.example_2: att'atthaṃ vā ñassati par'atthaṃ vā ñassati ubhay'atthaṃ vā ñassati uttariṃ vā manussadhammā alam'ariyañāṇadassanavisesaṃ sacchikarissatī'ti n'etaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
42909.commentary: (ANa) att'attham'pī'ti-ādīsu arahattasaṅkhāto attano attho att'attho nāma, paccayadāyakānaṃ attho par'attho nāma, sv'eva duvidho ubhayattho nāma.

49871.example_1: anagāriy'upetassa, bhikkhācariyaṃ jigīsato, muni pabrūhi me puṭṭho, moneyyaṃ uttamaṃ padaṃ.
49871.example_2: te upakaṭṭhāya vass'ūpanāyikāya pañcasatatāpase himavantato āgantvā nagare bhikkhāya carante disvā pasīditvā nisīdāpetvā bhojetvā paṭiññaṃ gahetvā cattāro māse attano santike vasāpetvā puna vassāratte āgaman'atthāya paṭijānāpetvā uyyojesuṃ.
